title: 1998 Stepp MFG 250Gal Asphalt Tack Trailer
item_description:
1998 Stepp MFG 250Gal Asphalt Tack Trailer

  • Year: 1998
  • Manufacturer: Step MFG
  • Model: Asphalt Trailer
  • Tractor Type: NA
  • Hour Meter Reads: 1441
  • Serial: S-OJK-250-106
  • Tire Size: St225/75R15
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Width: 73”
  • Length: 168”
  • Height: 74”

Note:  This item is being sold on behalf of an estate to clear off of the property. This item either had one of the following categories; 1) No identification was found on the frame, or 2). The ID or license plate found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.

CARB Off-Road Diesel Disclosure Statement: “When operated in California, any off-road diesel vehicle may be subject to the California Air Resources Board In-Use Off-road Diesel Vehicle Regulation. It therefore could be subject to retrofit or accelerated turnover requirements to reduce emissions of air pollutants. For more information, please visit the California Air Resources Board website at http://www.arb.ca.gov/msprog/ordiesel/ordiesel.htm.”
